EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Account is 74 Days Past Due

Hello {!Account.Name},
Your BlueWave account is 74 days past due.
Your outstanding account balance is {!Account.Total_Outstanding_Balance_Merge__c}.
To check the status of your account and make a payment online, please login to your BlueWave Portal. You can also access your portal at bluewavesolar.com.
Your community solar agreement will officially be terminated when you are removed from the project. Till then, your account remains due.
Log Into Your Portal Here
